pages.text: Unicorns come in three different species corresponding to the three dimensions. Whilst Unicorns can come in all colors and patterns that an O-Horse can, they generally come in colors corresponding to their dimension. $(br2)Overworld: Light, Soft Colors $(br)Nether: Dark, Heavy Colors $(br)End: Mid-Toned, Desaturated Colors

pages.name: Overworld (0)
pages.text: Has a chance to spawn in place of a Rabbit in a Meadow. Takes Heart of the Sea, Amethyst Clusters, or Emeralds as tame food.

pages.name: Nether (1)
pages.text: Has a chance to spawn in place of a Piglin Brute in the Nether. Takes Netherite Scrap, Gold Blocks, or Quartz Blocks as tame food.

pages.name: End (2)
pages.text: Has a chance to spawn in place of an Enderman in the End. Takes End Crystals, Dragon Breath, or Ender Pearls as tame food.
